data.sql: UPDATE players SET type = 3 WHERE id = @combat_admin_id;

INSERT OR IGNORE INTO shiptypes (id, name, basecost, maxholds, maxfighters, maxshields, maxgenesis, max_detonators, max_probes, can_transwarp, can_planet_scan, can_long_range_scan, max_cloaks) VALUES (1, 'Scout Marauder', 1000, 100, 1000, 500, 5, 5, 5, 1, 1, 1, 1);

BEGIN TRANSACTION; DELETE FROM ships WHERE id = @attacker_player_id; INSERT INTO ships (id, type_id, name, fighters, sector, ported) VALUES (@attacker_player_id, 1, 'AttackerShip', 50, 300, 0); UPDATE players SET ship = @attacker_player_id, sector = 300 WHERE id = @attacker_player_id; INSERT OR IGNORE INTO ship_ownership (ship_id, player_id, is_primary) VALUES (@attacker_player_id, @attacker_player_id, 1); COMMIT;

BEGIN TRANSACTION; DELETE FROM ships WHERE id = @defender_player_id; INSERT INTO ships (id, type_id, name, fighters, sector, ported, hull, shields) VALUES (@defender_player_id, 1, 'DefenderShip', 100, 300, 0, 500, 500); UPDATE players SET ship = @defender_player_id, sector = 300 WHERE id = @defender_player_id; INSERT OR IGNORE INTO ship_ownership (ship_id, player_id, is_primary) VALUES (@defender_player_id, @defender_player_id, 1); COMMIT;
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO sectors (id, name) VALUES (300, 'Battle Arena');
SELECT 1 FROM ships WHERE id = @defender_player_id AND (hull < 500 OR shields < 500);
UPDATE players SET sector = 1 WHERE id IN (@attacker_player_id, @defender_player_id); UPDATE ships SET sector = 1 WHERE id IN (@attacker_player_id, @defender_player_id);
